item.title: About Me
item.description: Me I’m currently working as a developer for one of the well-known automotive companies. The reason why I chose to become a programmer is simply for the fun of it. Yes, the man who is driven by his curiosity. I believe life is full of adventures. I’ll keep chasing for new challenges. Words from one of my favorite video games, for you traveler, as a gift, “May the sapphire star lights your wayâœ¨”.
